div.sent: Whatever we have around us is called our environment.
The natural environment may be affected for various reasons.
When this happens, we call it environmental pollution.
The natural (ecological) balance is destroyed.
The population of our country is increasing rapidly.
The more the population is growing, the more problems are arising.
With the growth of population, new houses are coming up.
Trees and plants are being cut down to make room for building houses.
Lakes are being filled up.
Water is being polluted.
The lands are losing their fertility for cultivating crops again and again.
The soil is being polluted.
The number of industries and vehicles is increasing.
Air and noise pollution is taking place.
Consequently, the level of environmental pollution is increasing.
Let us read in the following table below what pollution is.
happening in the environment due to rapid growth of population.
We take our breath from air.
Air pollution causes diseases like cough, cold and various lungs troubles.
Water is another name for life.
No creature can live without water.
Drinking polluted water causes stomach troubles, dysentery, typhoid, cholera jaundice etc.
Often arsenic is mixed with water below the sub soil.
If this water is used, skin diseases develop.
Noise is a kind of power.
It reaches the ears and creates the feeling of hearing.
A shrill noise may tear the covering of the ear leading to deafness.
Blood pressure might go up and the heart may be affected.
Sharp sound causes headaches, sleeplessness and makes one jittery.
In most cases soil is polluted through water and air pollution.
Repeated cultivation of crops reduces the fertility of the soil.
Eating crops and vegetables produced in polluted soil affects human health.
Human beings use the natural resources for their own sake.
The more the population grows, the more the resources are used.
We often misuse the resources without understanding.
We cut downs the surrounding trees and plants out of necessity or without necessity.
We destroy the forest resources.
We catch immature fish.
We destroy bio-diversity.
Environmental pollution is one of the problems of Bangladesh.
Environment is polluted due to social causes.
We often pollute environment by throwing garbage here and there without understanding.
Environment is polluted due to lack of necessary education.
Social environment is polluted due to lack of awareness.
Social environment is polluted if rules and regulations are not maintained.
We will not throw garbage here and there in our OWN areas.
We will not turn up the volumes of radio and tale vision.
Our life is dependent on healthy environment.
All of us will be careful to preserve a beautiful, clean and natural environment.
If we do so, the ecological balance of the environment will be maintained.
